commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Sigh* I skipped school. Am I causing trouble for everyone? I'm too scared to check my phone!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wh-Who is it?!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: It's me, Mifune.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Sh-Shioriko?! Wh-Why have you come all the way to my house?!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: May I come in?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, um, sure.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Thank you.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: So, uh... What made you drop by all of a sudden?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I have come to pay you a visit as I hear you were absent from school.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: So that's why you came all this way?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: How are you feeling? Is it okay for you to be up and about like this?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ack, sorry for making you worry about me. Um, I actually skipped school today. I just didn't feel like going.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I see. As long as you're okay, then that's fine.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Y-You're not gonna get mad at me? What I'm doing is definitely something that I deserve to be lectured about.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Do you want to be lectured?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Well, no...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Then I won't. I am sure there are days when you just don't feel like going to school. I don't quite understand that myself, however.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I don't feel like going to school, and I've skipped practice without telling anyone. I really am pathetic.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hey, Shioriko? I really don't know what to do right now.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Um, do you mind if I ask you something? What do you think I'm best suited to--

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Uehara.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Might I suggest we step outside for a change of pace? You will feel even more depressed if you stay cooped up in your room.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It's been a while since I last came here as well. I used to come to hang out, even if I didn't have anything to buy. I haven't been doing that lately, though...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Because I've been busy with school idol stuff every day...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, I know. Maybe I'll get back into some knitting. Can we go look at this store?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Sure.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh my gosh, I bought so much! I pretty much used up all my allowance.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: *Chuckle* Seeing that shopping spree of yours was quite exhilarating.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Giggle* There was just so much I wanted to buy since I haven't been here in a while.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Not only do you knit, but you also cook and make accessories. You have quite the array of hobbies.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, I think you're right about that. I've been completely consumed by my school idol activities lately, but it looks like I had a lot of hobbies to begin with.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I gotta get back all of the time I couldn't spend on my hobbies. There's so much to do starting tomorrow. Looks like I'm not gonna be bored for a while, ahaha.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Are you really okay with that?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Am I okay with what?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Not being a school idol. Are you going to quit?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: ...Yeah.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I think I've had enough. I mean, it's not like I actually liked school idols to begin with, and it's not something I wanted to do either.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sure this is the right choice. All I'm doing is going back to who I originally was.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I see. To me, you appeared to be having a lot of fun as a school idol.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Did I?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: On the day before the school tour, you kept practicing even when I told you to stop, didn't you?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: O-Oh, well... That was...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I know! Because I was representing everyone! I just felt like I had to carry those feelings with me!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes, you do care a great deal for the club.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I personally have mixed feelings towards school idols. However, even I understand how irreplaceable that environment is after temporarily joining the club myself.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Everyone in the club seemed to have a sparkle to them. Including you.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: You shined brightly when you were practicing and performing.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: A-Ahaha... Thanks, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: But, you know what? I've had enough. I don't have any reason to be a school idol anymore.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Is that so?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: May I ask you something? Do you regret becoming a school idol?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: No. I was really happy and had a lot of fun knowing that there were people cheering even someone like me on.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: But now... Um, I couldn't care less anymore.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: If you're all right with that, then so be it. I will not say otherwise. However, if there is something you perhaps need me to do...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Thanks, Shioriko. Maybe I'll drag you along to go shopping with me again. *Chuckle*
